name: Mega Man-Vile's End
description:
★★★★★★★INSTRUCTIONS★★★★★★★

- Arrow keys or WASD to move and jump

- Space to charge and fire your blaster 

- Press C to dash

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Mega Man X is jogging outside on the highway until one of his greatest enemies, Vile, crashes in to him. Mega Man X hunts down Vile in an attempt to settle their dispute.
